str2: Therefore, then. Apparently a primary word; certainly, or accordingly.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

parse: Verb - Present Indicative Active - 1st Person Plural
str2: To have, hold, possess. Including an alternate form scheo skheh'-o; a primary verb; to hold.
Fitting season, season, opportunity, occasion, time. Of uncertain affinity; an occasion, i.e. Set or proper time.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Middle or Passive - 1st Person Plural
str2: To work, trade, perform, do, practice, commit, acquire by labor.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.
All, the whole, every kind of. Including all the forms of declension; apparently a primary word; all, any, every, the whole.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.
Most of all, especially. Neuter plural of the superlative of an apparently primary adverb mala; most or particularly.
To, towards, with. A strengthened form of pro; a preposition of direction; forward to, i.e. Toward.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Of one's family, domestic, intimate. From oikos; domestic, i.e., a relative, adherent.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Faith, belief, trust, confidence; fidelity, faithfulness.
